wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Greig Hunter (born 8 November 1954) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Northwich Victoria and was on the books of Shrewsbury Town without making a league appearance.

response: * Gordon Hunter (footballer, born 1954), English footballer (York City)
* Gordon Hunter (rugby union) (1949–2002), New Zealand rugby union player, coach and selector
